ssot__EngagementTopic__dlm.name: Engagement Topic
ssot__EngagementTopic__dlm.description: The Engagement Topic DMO represents the topics discussed by a customer and other attendees during an engagement. An engagement can have multiple topics, such as campaigns, promotions, opportunities, and tasks.

ssot__CampaignId__c.description: A reference ID for a campaign. A campaign is an outbound marketing project that you want to plan, manage, and track. It can be a direct mail program, seminar, print advertisement, email, or other type of marketing initiative.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by External Record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EngagementId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement record, which is described by the Engagement Topic. For example, an Engagement record that describes an email opened event could have a sales campaign as a topic.

ssot__EngagementTopicGroupId__c.description: A reference ID for the main list of topics that engagements can be about.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Email Template DMO.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID for the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when user last modified record.

ssot__OpportunityId__c.description: A reference ID for a deal or sale that is in progress, not yet completed.

ssot__PromotionId__c.description: A reference ID for any type of marketing communication used to inform or persuade target audiences of the relative merits of a product, service, brand, or issue.
